name: OR_LOG_CHARGING_PROCS
description: This table contains information about procedures group for charging flags.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the log record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CHARGE_PROC_ID
columns.description: The procedures grouped for charging flags. This does not drive charging automatically, but is informational.

columns.name: CHARGE_PROC_ID_PROC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the surgical procedure record.

columns.name: CHARGE_COSMETIC_C_NAME
columns.description: Whether the procedure is cosmetic. This does not drive charging automatically, but is informational.
